'''1.8.4'''<ref>http://www.reddit.com/r/Minecraft/comments/32tb8e/hey_rminecraft_i_wanted_to_bring_light_to_an/cqeo2oe</ref> is a minor update to {{JE}} which was released on April 17, 2015,<ref name="official post">{{cite|url=https://www.mojang.com/2015/04/minecraft-1-8-4-security-release/|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2015/04/minecraft-1-8-4-security-release/|title=Minecraft 1.8.4 Security Release|author=Dinnerbone|website=Mojang.com|date=April 17, 2015}}</ref> to fix various exploits and important security vulnerabilities,<ref>http://www.reddit.com/r/Minecraft/comments/32tb8e/hey_rminecraft_i_wanted_to_bring_light_to_an/</ref><ref>http://blog.ammaraskar.com/minecraft-vulnerability-advisory/</ref><ref>{{tweet|Dinnerbone|589042068615475201|That exploit posted last night is fixed in 1.8.4, but so are other (arguably worse) exploits. Be sure to update!|April 17, 2015}}</ref> as well as some other minor issues. 1.8.4 is compatible with [[Java Edition 1.8|1.8]] – [[Java Edition 1.8.3|1.8.3]] servers.<ref>http://mcupdate.tumblr.com/post/116645435739/minecraft-1-8-4</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Mobs ===
'''[[Ocelot]]s and [[wolves]]'''
* No longer follow players in Spectator mode.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Nether portal]]'''
* Traveling through no longer places the player outside the portal.<ref>https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-73504?focusedCommentId=224785&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-224785</ref>

=== General ===
'''[[Skin]] customization'''
* Player head skins can no longer be loaded from arbitrary servers.<ref>{{reddit|32xdcl/the_end_of_custom_player_heads}}</ref>
** They must now be loaded from the official [[Mojang]] servers.
* Player head skin files are now required to be a ''.png'' file.
